key.name: fade-time
key.description: Fade time (in ms) for the popup window. (10 - 5000)

key.name: always-show
key.description: Show resize info for all windows as opposed to just for text based windows like terminals.

key.name: resizeinfo-font-bold
key.description: Render the resize info's size display with a bold font.

key.name: resizeinfo-font-size
key.description: Font size of the resize info's display. (10 - 14)

key.name: text-color
key.description: Color and opacity of the resize popup's text.

key.name: gradient-1
key.description: Color and opacity on the left side of the gradient background.

key.name: gradient-2
key.description: Color and opacity in the center of the gradient background.

key.name: gradient-3
key.description: Color and opacity on the right side of the gradient background.

key.name: outline-color
key.description: Color and opacity of the background's outline.
